text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host. Welcome to our phonics show
Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet. Isn’t that cool?
They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
Let’s give a W W W warm W W W welcome to the one and only Mr. W.
A W W W W watch A W W W W watch.

Watches and clocks tell you the time 
Either by a tick-tock or a chime.
A W W W W wagon A W W W W wagon.
In a wagon, I carry my things all packed and tied up with strings
A W W W walrus A W W W walrus
Slides into the sea with a splash It has two tusks and a moustache.
A W W W W wasp A W W W W wasp

You can see all the wasps swarm
When the weather’s really warm.
W W W W water W W W W water
I always drink a lot of water when the days get hotter.
A W W W W woman A W W W W woman

Daddy you see is a strong man
Mommy is a lovely woman.

A W W W W walnut
A W W W W walnut

A walnut has a hard shell
Eating it will keep you well.
W W W W W wool W W W W W wool

Let’s Knit a sweater with some wool
And wear it when it gets too cool.
A W W W W windmill A W W W W windmill

A windmill is a small tower
That can create a lot of power.
A W W W W whale A W W W W whale
A whale is happy and carefree When he’s swimming in the sea
You and I together become W W W - WE
And now, Judges! What’s the score gonna be?
Wise!
Warm-hearted!
Witty!
Wonderful!
Wow!
Thank you Mr. W, and you winsome Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
